body.description: Type-C and USB-A Dual mode (USB + C type receiver) wireless mouse The connected USB and Type-C nano receiver (Type-C does not need to switch) plug and play. It is directly applicable to all computer devices with Type-c and USB-A interfaces and is compatible with laptop computers. Note that for the USB/A receiver and Type-c receiver, the mouse can only choose one of them of course, you can choose it according to your computer Interface Q23S wireless mouse Compatible systems: compatible Windows XP / 7/8/10 +, Mac OS X 10.10+. Very suitable for computers with USB or Type-C ports, such as MacBook Pro, MacBook air, Google ChromeBook, laptops, desktops, PCs, etc. The package includes: 1 wireless mouse 1 USB receiver 1 type C receiver 1 USB charging cable and 1 user manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Halpilt Q23S Dual mode wireless mouse--(Gray) About the design and production of this wireless mouse Halpilt-Q23s Wireless Mouse is a rechargeable wireless mouse, portable wireless mouse and silent wireless mouse with two interfaces (Type-C +USB).Delicate, compact, fashionable design style, is home office, travel office, business office excellent assistant.Stable connection and easy to useUSB2.4G wireless connection, stable connection, working distance up to 33 feet. Life span of 5 million button clicks,Support Plug and Play: Both USB and Type C receivers are stored on the bottom of the mouse, take them out and plug into the computer’s port, and then it's working, not need to any drives, extremely easy to use.Thank you very much for choosing it!

Q23S wireless mouse Product specifications: WIFI frequency band: 2.4 GConnection range: 33 feetMouse DPI: 1000-1200-16000Click life: good (5 million times)Ports: USB-A and USB Type-CSize: 4.3×2.3×0.9 inchesWeight: 2.1 ouncesBattery capacity: 450mAh250 HzCharging cable: USB-Mirco 20in Type-C and USB-A Dual mode (USB + C type receiver) wireless mouse The connected USB and Type-C nano receiver (Type-C does not need to switch) plug and play. It is directly applicable to all computer devices with Type-c and USB-A interfaces and is compatible with laptop computers. Note that for the USB/A receiver and Type-c receiver, the mouse can only choose one of them of course, you can choose it according to your computer Interface Q23S wireless mouse Compatible systems: compatible Windows XP / 7/8/10 +, Mac OS X 10.10+. Very suitable for computers with USB or Type-C ports, such as MacBook Pro, MacBook air, Google ChromeBook, laptops, desktops, PCs, etc. The package includes: 1 wireless mouse 1 USB receiver 1 type C receiver 1 USB charging cable and 1 user manual

Q23S-Rechargeable wireless mouse function introduction Wireless mouse with charging function and rechargeable battery The Q23S wireless mouse is a rechargeable wireless mouse product. It has a built-in 450mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery, which can be easily charged with the included 20-inch USB cable, eliminating the trouble of replacing the battery. It supports charging during use and use while charging. It is recommended that you charge the product for 1-2 hours before using the product for the first time. When charging, a red light will appear in the gap between the rollers, and when the battery is fully charged, the red light will go out, which means the charging cycle. High-precision, smart,ving wireless mouse Q23S wireless mouse It is a 3-speed wireless mouse with adjustable DPI With 3 adjustable DPI levels of 1000-1200-1600, you can precisely control the cursor speed you need, which is suitable for learning, work and games. Design for Low Power Consumption : The computer mouse will enter auto-sleep mode after 10mins of inactivity, and can be waken up by clicking any button. The on/off switch design also helps save energy and extends battery life. Silent click and comfortable use-silent wireless mouse Q23S wireless mouse It is a Mute wireless mouse The left, right and scroll wheel buttons are filled to reduce noise. The design allows you to focus on work, study or games without worrying about disturbing others. Smooth matte surface, skin-friendly and ergonomic grip design can provide excellent hand feeling, even if you work for a long time, you can maintain a comfortable feeling. The compact portable size also makes it very convenient to store it in a computer bag when traveling.

Q23S Portable Wireless Mouse Function Introduction Delicate and cabinet Q23S wireless mouse It is an ultra-thin wireless mouse. Exquisite, compact, stylish appearance, unique vacuum silver plating process, unique temperament, skin-like matte texture, looking forward to your choice. Meet Your Multiple Needs Q23S portable wireless mouse meets your various needs, Support Type-c port equipment. Whether your device is equipped with a USB port or a Type-C port, you can use it. The USB + Type-c receiver is stored on the bottom of the mouse Symmetry Design wireless mouse Q23S wireless mouse It is a wireless mouse suitable for both left and right hands Slim ergonomic design and smooth surface for an incredible user experience. Symmetrical design allows it to fit both hands, you can choose it as you like, easy to master.

Wireless mouse reality scene show Halpilt-Q23s Wireless Mouse is a rechargeable wireless mouse, portable wireless mouse and silent wireless mouse with two interfaces (Type-C +USB).Delicate, compact, fashionable design style, is home office, travel office, business office excellent assistant.Stable connection and easy to useUse 2.4G wireless technology to ensure a stable connection and longer working distance, up to 33 feet. Passed 5,000,000 key press tests to ensure strong durability.Support Plug and Play: Both USB and Type C receivers are stored on the bottom of the mouse, take them out and plug into the computer’s port, and then it's working, not need to any drives, extremely easy to use.Thank you very much for choosing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse, unbelievably low price
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a wireless mouse to use with my LG Gram laptop. Was looking for something that would fit in the bag easily, and not too expensive. When I saw this one I almost passed it up because I couldn't believe it could be usable at that price.Wrong. Looks great, works great, feels great in use. Buy it -- you won't regret it...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse, works well on MacBook Air
reviews.reviewText: I like that this has USB-C (along with Type-A receiver). My previous mouse like this was Bluetooth and it would disconnect while mousing around, no good. This one has been great.This is working in a MacBook Air, I am new to the Mac and have been using a PC mouse for right at 30 years. It is kind of hard for this old dog to learn new tricks.Slides across the desk or mouse pad nicely. Seems accurate in the movement on screen. Scrolls smoothily too. I am a trying to figure out the battery life; after leaving it on for a couple of days without use it wouldn't work I had to move the dongle to the other USB port to get it to respond. Maybe since the battery on the Mac was really low it suspended that port or something.I have dropped it on a hard wood floor once and it has survived.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic - for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This is the lightest mouse in history. It has rechargeable batteries built into the mouse (not removable) and a red light to indicate it is charging. My ONLY criticism is that there is no indicator when the battery is low - it just stops working. I get about 7 to 10 days of constant use off each charge. I am assuming that duration will lessen as time goes by, but it's worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 6 months
reviews.reviewText: i loved the clicking how it wasn't so loud and the smooth look of it and how the battery life is excellent and long lasting. IT JUST DID NOT LAST LONG i mean you get for what u pay for right. 6 months and it stopped turning on even when i charged it. 4/5 starts thought it would last at least a year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and is silent!
reviews.reviewText: I love the color of this mouse. It is quiet, so there's no annoying clicking when you are using it. The price was right and I'm glad I purchased it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great battery life, feel sleek under my hand and the color adds a cool look to the work space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and pretty - but I have to recharge every day
reviews.reviewText: I even turned it off last night to preserve the battery, but this morning it was completely drained again. I'm basically using it as a wired mouse, which is annoying. Also, I thought that since it has a USB-C connector to my laptop, surely it would charge with USB-C, too. Nope - it's Micro USB. I'm ready to retire my Micro USB cords, but this is keeping them in the mix. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When ergonomics meets sleak, this is the product!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using it for the past two weeks and it has been very reliable! So much easier to get work done and how compact it is to fit it within your backpack. Its a must if you need a new ergonomically made and sleak mouse for your Macbook or Chrome book!
Bought this mouse because it looked sleek and has both Type C and USB adaptor. Interchangeable, depending on the model of your laptop.
